review: This thing is great. I have other streaming devies in the house, but this is my favorite. I don't play many games on the other units, but there are some great ones available for free on the FireTV -- for both big time gamers as well as people like myself that prefer bowling, pinball, etc. Another feature that's awesome on here is the voice search. The voice search is always accurate and saves a lot of time and frustration not having to type in search items, etc.
author: Michelle Watson

review: We like the fire TV, however, be aware that there may be issues between fire TV and Netflix and Hulu. We've had to call several times to Netflix because they would appear to want to charge for content. We have monthly subscriptions to all actually, if you count Amazon Prime.Netflix informed me there could sometimes be issues between Netflix and amazon fire or iTunes???  Anyway, Netflix was able to manually add TV program to my daughter's TV and it wouldn't charge us for the program.
